relation: The subway line 15 can help you get to the China International Exhibition Center (New Venue); you can take subway line 15 from Wangjing West Station.
You can enter the subway system from any entrance and transfer to line 15 at the Wangjing West Station to the China International Exhibition Center (New Venue)
Shaoyaoju (transfer station)→Line 13→Wangjing West (transfer station) → Line 15→China International Exhibition Center
Wangjing West (transfer station)→Line 15→China International Exhibition Center
You can also take buses 915,915(2), 915(3), 916, 918, 923, 934, 936 from Dongzhimen, and get off at Maliandian or Hualikan station, and then walk to the New International Exhibition Center.
textBeforeTable: Add: 88 Yuxiang Rd., Tianzhu Zone, Shunyi Dist., Beijing 101318, P. R. China Venue: China International Exhibition Center (New Venue) In order to ensure the international visitors and exhibitors getting to the New International Exhibition Center successfully, the organization committee has arranged some suitable transportation routes. Please read the following transportation tips carefully and choose the most convenient ways for the transportation.    Transportation Home > Travel Guide > Transportation Hotels Restaurants Transportation Travel Guide YASN In News
textAfterTable: Subway-taking Tips： The China International Exhibition Center (New Venue) is located in the Shunyi District in Beijing. Just 15 minutes taking subway line 15 will reach the event venue from the downtown.
